jobDescription: The Technical Consultant provides pre-sales services to both internal and external customers focusing on the implementation and deployment of Information Software offerings. Reporting to the Manager of Information Software, Technical Consultants, this position primarily provides sales support to the Information Solutions Sales  Executives primarily within North America as well as other key customer engagements from other sales teams. In addition, strong commercial, product/service/solution and application skills are necessary. This position requires moderate to extensive travel primarily within North America, but could include some in our other global regions.
